summary: This document is a declaration by Denise Johannes, the custodian of records for the Office of the Lieutenant Governor, affirming the receipt of a Grand Jury Subpoena dated July 23, 2019. It certifies the authenticity of records provided in response to the subpoena, confirming they were created in the regular course of business.

persons.name: Denise Johannes
persons.context: Denise Johannes is the declarant who certifies the authenticity of the records in response to a Grand Jury Subpoena.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: An unnamed Assistant United States Attorney issued the Grand Jury Subpoena requesting records.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoena Issued
events.description: A Grand Jury Subpoena was issued requesting specific records from the Office of the Lieutenant Governor.

events.title: Declaration Executed
events.description: Denise Johannes executed a declaration affirming the receipt and authenticity of records in response to the subpoena.

keyFacts: Denise Johannes is the custodian of records for the Office of the Lieutenant Governor.
A Grand Jury Subpoena was issued on July 23, 2019, requesting records.
The declaration certifies that the records were made in the regular course of business.
The declaration was executed on July 27, 2019.
The Assistant United States Attorney who issued the subpoena is unnamed in the document.
